name: Croda International - Cholesterol NF
description: Croda International offers Cholesterol NF (National Formulary grade), a powerful W/O emulsifier, moisturizer, and emollient. This pharmaceutical-grade cholesterol serves as an O/W co-emulsifier and stabilizer, essential for creating effective barrier repair formulations. Widely used in creams, lotions, ointments, and absorption bases.
notes: Croda is a major global player in cosmetic ingredients with excellent technical support. NF grade ensures pharmaceutical quality. Versatile applications in creams, lotions, ointments, and absorption bases. Essential for proper barrier repair formulations.
